section.title: About DocBook Generating in This Project
section.para: In DocBook OpenGLNotes, the reference pages are mainly converted from OpenGL official API manual. So, if you want the update the reference pages, follow the steps below:

step.para: Fetch the refernce man pages you need from OpenGL Man Source.

There are two kinds of pages. One is those that will appear in toc. These files should be stored in etc/utils/convertglmanual/glmansource. The other is called included pages. These files should be store in etc/utils/convertglmanual/glmansource/included.
In Cygwin console, run the ConvertOpenGLManual.sh in etc/utils/convertglmanual.
This will convert and generate corresponding XML files in Docs/DocBook/OpenGLNotes/Content/references/converted.
Add the files in OpenGLReferencePages.xml in Docs/DocBook/OpenGLNotes/Content/references.
